trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> and <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs의 인스턴스를 만들 때의 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>발생 시키는 개체의 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the result of recognition, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 인식의 결과 대 한 정보를 얻으려면 액세스는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>속성에 대 한 이벤트 처리기에서.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Emulation is the process by which text, instead of audio, is the input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 에뮬레이션 하는 프로세스는 기준인 오디오 대신 텍스트 음성 인식 엔진에 대 한 입력은입니다.

trans-unit.source: To bypass the audio inputs for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object during emulation, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 오디오 입력을 무시 하는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>에뮬레이션을 사용 하는 동안 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 음성 인식 엔진에서 인식 작업 중에 예외가 발생 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>예외 속성 및 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>속성이 `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the results of emulated recognition.

The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>개체에서 파생 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>인식 작업에서 반환 하는 문구에 대 한 전체 정보를 포함 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 모든 인식 후보 오프 목록을 가져올 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the Result property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 인식기에서 인식 작업 중에 예외가 발생 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>예외에 속성이 설정 되어 있고 결과 속성이로 설정 되어 `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 인식의 결과 대 한 자세한 정보 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 오류가 발생 합니다.
